createHTLC(address,address,address,uint2.details: Create a new HTLC for cross-chain swap

params.resolver: Address of the user resolving the swap

emergencyRecover(address,address,uint256.details: Emergency function to recover stuck tokens (owner only)

executeHTLCWithSwap(bytes32,bytes32,uint.details: Execute HTLC with 1inch Fusion order completion

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

refundHTLC(bytes32).details: Refund HTLC if timelock has expired

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._protocolFee: New protocol fee in basis points

submitOrder(bytes32,string).details: Submit 1inch Fusion order for HTLC execution

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.token: Token address to withdraw fees for
